House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08019
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO ENHANCE THE SHARE OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS IN INTERNAL REVENUE TAXES
ABSTRACT : Mandates that local govt units shall have a share in the internal revenue taxes INCLUSIVE OF VALUE ADDED TAX PAID ON IMPORTS to provide the LGUs to pursue economic development and fund programs for improvement of their respective constituents.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
